channel.title: markdown on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in markdown on Today I Learned

item.description: That on GitHub, you can add footers like statement[^1] [^1]: footnote See https://github.blog/changelog/2021-09-30-footnotes-now-supported-in-markdown-fields/ or https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/writing-on-github/getting-started-with-writing-and-formatting-on-github/basic-writing-and-formatting-syntax#footnotes
